item.description:
Maddy’s Lounge
1639 Broadway
Rte 1 so/ Rte 99
Saugus, MA
www.BlushBoston.com

DJ JODI & KARAOKE (April 3rd)

Here we are again On The First Saturday of the month again with DJ JODI.

Since we had a great turn out last month (over 300 fabulous woman) we will have a repeat with a complimentary Kowloons buffet, FREE Raffle tickets to win some great gifts and gift cards along with a 50/50 raffle.

An all Ladies T-Dance on the first Saturday of every month at Maddy’s Lounge. Dance to the sounds of D.J. Jodi to her R&B, Latin and Hip Hop music from 3:00 to 8:00 PM.

To be followed at The Hide Away with D.J. Tracy mixing her music all night long till 1:30 AM.

• Free Parking
• 21+, Proper I.D. required
• Hi Def TV (Sports Channel)
• Plenty of seating
• Great FOOD
• HUGE dance floor
• Premium Liquor
• KENO (Maddy's)
• $10.00 cover charge
• Pleasant lounge area (separate room)

Any questions email BlushBoston@yahoo.com or call 617 877 1808.
item.name: Maddy's Lounge & Bar (All LADIES T-Dance)
